location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reports on William Bruce's meeting at Muscat with the Imaun [Imam] of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd]. Bruce describes his success in persuading the Imaun to comply with William Smith's claim for payment. Bruce also discusses the Imaun's desire to reinstate the Joasimese [Āl Qāsimī ] Chief, Shaik Sultan ben Luggar [Sulṭān bin Saqr Āl Qāsimī] as ruler of Rasilkima [Ra's al-Khaymah].
